QuestData.Title: Ride to the Undercity
QuestData.Description: One of my bats can take you to the Undercity. Normally these flights require a small fee, but the flight to Undercity is complimentary for a $g handsome: lovely; $r like you. Speak with me again when you are ready so that we may arrange your transport.$B$BYou will find Gordon Wendham in the Trade Quarter of the Undercity. That is the same quarter where my bat will land.
QuestData.LogDescription: Request a bat ride to the Undercity from the bat master Bat Handler Anette, then take Morris's Order to Gordon Wendham in the Undercity.
QuestData.CompletionText: I keep my weapons in top condition. They are cleaned and ready for use.
QuestData.RewardText: An order from Brill? Very well. It is an honor to serve those who serve our Dark Lady.
